conferences.name: App World
conferences.description: It aims to be the Middle Eastâ€™s largest exhibition specialized on applications, it gathers a lot of local and international applications under one roof which gives investors, and application owners an opportunity to collaborate and network, also it will support the Saudi start-ups by providing a platform to highlight and launch them. The exhibition will host thousands of visitors to learn about new technologies, and to uplift their technical knowledge.
conferences.location: Riyadh International Convention & Exhibition Center, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
